title: How to Create Grass in Little Alchemy 2: Recipes, Tips, & More

steps.title: There are two recipes to make Grass in Little Alchemy 2.
steps.content: There are two recipes to make Grass in Little Alchemy 2. Compared to some other elements, Grass is a relatively simple element to make in Little Alchemy 2 . Simply combine Plant with Earth or Land . [1] X Research source You can get Plant in a number of ways, such as combining Seed with Water , Soil , Land , or Earth . [2] X Research source Earth is one of the base elements that you get at the start of the game. [3] X Research source The easiest way to get Land is to combine Earth and Earth , since Earth is available from the start of the game. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Using Time.
steps.content: Using Time. Time is an element that is unlocked after you unlock 100 other elements. If you have the Time element, you can use it when making the Grass element. The fastest path to unlock Grass with Time is as follows: Water + Water = Puddle Puddle + Puddle = Pond Pond + Pond = Lake Lake + Lake = Sea Earth + Sea = Primordial Soup Primordial Soup + Time = Life Earth + Life = Soil Life + Soil = Plant Plant + Earth = Grass

steps.title: Without using Time.
steps.content: Without using Time. You can still get the Grass element if you don't have Time unlocked yet. Follow this path to unlock Grass without Time: Water + Water = Puddle Puddle + Puddle = Pond Pond + Pond = Lake Lake + Lake = Sea Earth + Sea = Primordial Soup Fire + Fire = Energy Primordial Soup + Energy = Life Earth + Life = Soil Life + Soil = Plant Plant + Earth = Grass

steps.title: Many recipes use the Grass element.
steps.content: Many recipes use the Grass element. Some of these recipes require the Myths and Monsters DLC. The recipes that require Grass are as follows: Algae: Water or Pond or Lake + Grass Ant: Animal or Spider + Grass Ash: Fire + Grass Carbon Dioxide: Night + Grass Carrot: Vegetable + Grass Catnip: Cat + Grass Cow: Livestock + Grass Dew: Fog or Water or Dawn + Grass Farmer: Human + Grass Fence: Wall + Grass Flower: Garden or Seed or Rainbow or Double Rainbow + Grass Garden: Plant or Flower + Grass Greenhouse: Glass or Aquarium + Grass Hay: Scythe or Farmer or Sun or Barn or Farm or Pitchfork or Grass + Grass Ivy: Wall + Grass Lawn: House or Container or Lawn Mower + Grass Lawn Mower: Tool or Machine + Grass Moss: Stone or Rock or Boulder + Grass Nest: Bird or Egg + Grass Oxygen: Sun or Carbon Dioxide + Grass Park: City or Village + Grass Peat: Time + Grass Picnic: Sandwich + Grass Plant: Big + Grass Reed: Pond or Puddle or Swamp or River + Grass Scythe: Blade or Sword or Axe + Grass Seaweed: Sea or Ocean + Grass Smoke: Fire + Grass Swamp: Mud + Grass Tobacco: Smoke + Grass Wheat: Farmer or Domestication or Field + Grass
